## textArea() function

Create a textArea component builder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function textArea(options?: TextAreaBuilderOptions): ComponentBuilder<TextareaModel>;
```

**Returns:**

[ComponentBuilder](./dsl.componentbuilder.md)<!-- -->&lt;[TextareaModel](./textarea.textareamodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A `ComponentBuilder` ready to use with `AppBuilder.component`

## Remarks

Creates a `ComponentBuilder` wrapping the `@boba-cli/textarea` package. The text area supports multi-line editing, scrolling, line numbers, validation, and extensive styling options.

## Example 1

Basic usage:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('editor', textArea({
    placeholder: 'Enter your text...',
    maxHeight: 10
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.editor)
  .build()
```

## Example 2

With line numbers and validation:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('editor', textArea({
    placeholder: 'Type code here...',
    maxHeight: 20,
    width: 80,
    showLineNumbers: true,
    validate: (value) => {
      const lines = value.split('\n')
      if (lines.length > 100) return new Error('Maximum 100 lines')
      return null
    }
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.editor)
  .build()
```

## Example 3

With custom styling and cursor mode:

```typescript
import { textArea, CursorMode } from '@boba-cli/dsl'
import { Style } from '@boba-cli/chapstick'

const app = createApp()
  .component('styledEditor', textArea({
    prompt: '| ',
    showLineNumbers: true,
    cursorMode: CursorMode.Static,
    promptStyle: new Style().foreground('#6272a4'),
    textStyle: new Style().foreground('#f8f8f2'),
    lineNumberStyle: new Style().foreground('#44475a').dim(),
    cursorStyle: new Style().foreground('#ff79c6').bold()
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.styledEditor)
  .build()
```

## Example 4

Multi-line input with initial value:

```typescript
const app = createApp()
  .component('notes', textArea({
    value: 'Line 1\nLine 2\nLine 3',
    placeholder: 'Enter notes...',
    maxHeight: 15,
    maxWidth: 60
  }))
  .view(({ components }) => components.notes)
  .build()
```
